generated_body: The article likely reports on a tragic incident involving a Porsche vehicle that crashed into the second story of a building in New Jersey, resulting in two fatalities. The article might also provide information on the victims and any relevant safety concerns regarding such incidents. It is possible that the piece will touch on broader implications for vehicle safety or urban infrastructure, though this remains uncertain.
